column5: Condo is located 10 minutes (6 miles) from DFW, 20 minutes (14 miles) to Dallas Love Field, 20 minutes to Downtown. Close to shopping and restaurants; Irving Mall is 5 minutes away. Public transport access is a minute away on Esters Rd. and everything is a short Uber/Lyft ride.  Basic amenities are covered which you can freely use.
column8: One bedroom with en-suite bath in bright condo
